meaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>circumference</radical> around someone's <radical>hair</radical>, as in, you can see a circle drawn around the top of their head. As you examine it closer, and pull at it a bit, you realize that someone has <kanji>carve</kanji>d the hair off someone's head!
readingMnemonic: When you think of all the people who could have done this... all the people who could have <kanji>carve</kanji>d out someone's hair, only one person comes to mind, and that is Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう). She's the only person evil enough to do something like this.
